Room.Name: Thieve's Guild Green Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the qualifications room for thieves hoping to advance in level.
Room.LongDescription: A master training thief is here with you, and if you are successful in his assessment, you will be given the key to the training room door. If not, you will have to fight to obtain the key. Now... your test is to see if you can steal the key from the master without his detecting it.
